name: cognito-custom-message-lambda
description: Lambda to intercept Cognito verification codes and send to RabbitMQ

scripts.package: npm install --production && zip -r function.zip index.js node_modules package.json
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name CognitoCustomMessage --zip-file fileb://function.zip --region us-east-1
